entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • First class support for Vectored I/O #109358
  • Error building native AOT tests following instructions #109356
  • [mono] Failing `AsVector4Single` test with `Unsafe.BitCast` #109345
  • [API Proposal]: SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync(int waitCount) #109343
  • Linking Native AOT for android complains about -fPIC #109341
  • Wasm UnmanagedCallersOnly doesn't work for >8 arguments #109338
  • JIT: Bad codegen on arm64 with comparison involving division #109337
    10.0.0
  • Avoid hardcoded TFM in illink #109335
  • Avoid hardcoded NetCoreAppToolCurrent* properties #109329
    10.0.0
  • provide derivative for SoftMax and Sigmoid in System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives #109328
  • TensorPrimitives.SoftMax unnecessarily computes Exp twice #109327
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 10/27/2024 3:01:56 PM #109347
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression from ldsfld quirk change #109348

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Support General Math value creation without sign propagation #106927
  • WasmImportLinkage is not propagated in LibraryImport #109181
    10.0.0
  • 'ILLinkTreatWarningsAsErrors' doesn't seem to work when publishing as MSIX #109271
  • CI failure in DecimalTests BigIntegerAdd #106095
    Future
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'sourceIntervals[targetReg] != nullptr' during 'LSRA allocate' #107621
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'otherTargetInterval->registerType == TYP_DOUBLE' during 'LSRA allocate' #108000
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed 'interval->physReg == srcRegNum || (srcRegNum == REG_STK && interval->physReg == REG_NA)' during 'LSRA allocate' #107841
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect CA2021 Warning #109344
  • Why there's no constructor defined for DateOnly and TimeOnly to take DateTime object as an input #109353
  • [API Proposal]: When using File APIs, if the given path is a directory rather than a file, an appropriate error should be raised #109326
  • Array interface method devirtualization #62457
    Future
  • Implement __assume for non-windows builds #8544
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!fgRngChkThrowAdded' during 'Calculate stack level slots' #106401
    10.0.0
  • Performance regression in `Vector<T>.Vector<T>(T)` on x86/x64 #108929
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109364
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix non-funclet EH empty finally/fault removal #109361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Native AOT: marshal empty array as non-null #109360
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove thread contention from Activity Start/Stop #109359
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.x
  • [cdac] cleanup tests in a few ways #109357
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement `IXCLRDataTask::CreateStackWalk` #109350
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve handling of encoding of X.520 attributes #109349
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Make loop inversion graph based #109346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove uncompiled `net7.0` files #109342
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Handle IOV_MAX limit in RandomAccess #109340
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove "getenv" calls #109339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #109332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.1
  • Forward NetCoreAppToolCurrentVersion in DotNetBuild.props #109331
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add TryAdd and TryGetValue overloads with `out int index` to OrderedDictionary #109324
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #109322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add forwarding support for WasmLinkage on LibraryImport #109234
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Chore: fix some typos #109259
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove unused `CrawlFrame::GetExactGenericInstantiations` #109351
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Linux/arm: LSRA resolution issues #109173
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add priority queue implementation #109319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix superpmi for new method getMethodInstantiationArgument #109321
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix stress-http pipeline #109140
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http
  • Define __assume on unix #109247
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Use NAOT crossgen2 for collections #109333
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Move micro benchmarks to rc2 SDK #109334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update all devcontainers to noble #109241
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Link against debug version of LLVM in debug builds on Windows #109275
    area-Build-mono
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add some missing docs in System #107726
    area-Meta
  • Update remarks for `IsRealNumber` #108965
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder missing methods on generated types #109320
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Disable more red tests for crossgen lanes #109317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Lazily-initialize RegexCompiler's cached reflection members #109283
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move unboxing helpers to managed code #109135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • handle case of Proc Index > MAX_SUPPORTED_CPUS #109295
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Factor LibraryImports into Common\ for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #109196
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Adding CPUID for AVX10.2 #109302
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enable EVEX embedded broadcast in more places #109258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    arch-arm64, os-linux, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Detect mask usage for Across functions #109218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/9.0-staging] Replace a few SuppressMessage annotations with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #109186
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for Options_RespectRequiredConstructorParameters_FeatureSwitch test #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Delete accidentally checked in file: src/libraries/System.IO.Ports/tests/file.pp #109290
    area-System.IO.Ports
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2571161 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Re-enable trimming of library tests on Apple mobile #104097
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • add test for Int32 overflow for WriteGather in RandomAccess #109292
    area-System.IO, 10.0.0
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace Delegate MethodInfo cache with the MethodDesc #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump TraceEvent package version #109192
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ability to specify another package manager for JavaScript SDK projects #44516
  • dotnet-watch - using Process.Kill(false) hangs tests on Linux/OSx #44496

Closed

  • Question: Is the 9.0.100 daily build the final SDK? #44512
  • `dotnet build` ignores `/v` verbosity flag in .NET 9.0.0-preview.7 #43069
  • unable to execute the dotnet new mvc command in git #32874
  • #if MONOANDROID preprocessor is not available in .NET 7 project. #33136
  • The library hostfxr.dll was found, but loading it from C:\Program Files\dotnet\host\fxr\7.0.4\hostfxr.dll failed #31304
  • Cannot enumerate VS workloads on ARM64 (exception in `dotnet --info`) #31552
  • `dotnet restore -v:n` doesn't show the log #42835
  • global tools do not work #43171
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException Thrown by dotnet tool install #43651
    9.0.2xx
  • dotnet tool install with workaround NUGET_CERT_REVOCATION_MODE does no longer work #44123
  • sdk style project with .net framework 3.5 got incorrect result in VS2022 17.2.6(mscorlib.dll and nlp files copied) #26685
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9RTM SDK installed, install wasm-toos/maui/aspire failed with error "Workload installation failed: Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-rtm.24513.1' is lower than version '9.0.0'" #44217
  • During the installation of .NET 9.0 RC2 SDK, some MAUI manifests still remain 9.0 Preview 6 #43447
  • Build should fail or warn if a project uses features not supported by the build SDK #2557
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #44517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename the source build SmokeTests to just source build tests #44514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update targeting and runtime packs for net9.0 TFM #44508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • Default sign to false for all SB legs #44489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix .NET Framework test helix submission #44481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run MoveDotNetBuildLogs target even when the repo build fails #44480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ADD] dotnet solution migrate #44419
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Better structure VMR join points for resolvers #44428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove additional TL characters from the dotnet run output special casing for tests #44442
    Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider clearing state of iterator state machine when disposal completes #75666
    17.13
  • Use `ReadOnlySpan<T>.CopyTo` for collection expression #75664

Closed

  • "Out Variable Declaration" work items and open design issues #11566
    Backlog
  • DefaultInterfaceImplementation open issues and work items #17952
    Backlog
  • Test skip execution due to "Implementation of a `static` `virtual` method in derived type is getting ignored by runtime" #64501
    Backlog
  • Enable execution of test scenarios with implementation of static members in derived interfaces once runtime can handle it. #61321
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35428.265 #75662
  • Unexpected ref safety error assigning ref of captured local #65353
    17.13
  • Null reference exception in code fix provider for IDE0045 #71403
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35428.98 #75658
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35428.160 #75657

PullRequests

Created

  • Update global.json with updated msbuild version #75671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Detect struct cycles caused by erroneous field-like event declarations #75668
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Recognize and check an `unmanaged` constraint #75665
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, 17.13
  • Reduce memory and CPU costs due to SegmentedList usage #75661
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind lambda in `yield return` despite errors #75660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Workaround for binding redirect generation issue #75653
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Follow up on fixes in runtime (enable execution of affected scenarios) #75670
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #75669
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24528.3 #75659
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove redundant IsMono #75649
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix ref safety analysis of captured locals #75627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'use conditional expression' in top level statements #75645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add tests for `unmanaged` constraint #75629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #75672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Needs API Review, VSCode, Backlog
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ref analysis of self-assignment #75618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure discards are initially soft selected in VSCode #75655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle directives in trailing trivia #75595
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #58707
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicgrpcpublishaot #58706
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #58705
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #58704
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58703
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58702
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58701
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #58700
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #58699
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58698
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58697
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58696
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58695
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58694
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58693
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58692
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58691
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #58690
  • Blazor static SSR ExpressionFormatter.FormatLambda adds zero symbols \0\0\0\0 into an input name attribute value when it's size exceeds 128 symbols due to a bug in a ReverseStringBuilder #58689
  • Blazor - Why does NavigationManager.BaseUri not output https in the deployed application, but http? #58685
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58684
  • in k8s asp core webapi causes large memory consumption in dotnet/aspnet 8.0.10-noble-amd64 #58687
  • Dotnet 8 - Blazor Server - JS Interopt Can't Be Used In Delegating Handlers with Prerender Off #58682

Closed

  • When adding attribute ResponseCacheAttribute, it does not take any effect. #58604
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to load page in nopCommerceNetCore app after retargeting it to .NET 9.0 with error: System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #57493
    9.0.0
  • Add browser devtools experience for Blazor #44825
    Backlog
  • Feature request: Blazor attached properties #22316
    Backlog
  • Template UX refresh #40935
    Backlog
  • Make DOM element JavaScript lifecycle callbacks declarable in Razor syntax #17517
    Backlog
  • Support custom graphics from Blazor components across all hosting models #42216
    Backlog
  • The SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' in production application #5223
    Backlog
  • OpenAPI ArgumentNullException for type parameter when using parameterized controller route #58219
    9.0.0
  • Fix broken links #30886
  • Unable to build from command line: restore.cmd/build.cmd fails #33411
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI documents #55656

PullRequests

Created

  • Correct typo in WebApplication.cs #58708
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • don't throw a misleading exception upon a BadHttpRequestException #58688
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • Support returning OpenAPI document in YAML from MapOpenApi #58616
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add examples for attributes #58196
    area-mvc
  • Fully qualify type names for services when resolving in RequestDelegateGenerator #58640
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net maui help #25591
  • App Unresponsive when prompting the user from a new page #25585
  • Maui Android deployment fails with error XABLD7023 #25583
  • Editor Scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25581

  • [testing] Run Android device tests on Windows #25570
    .NET 9 SR1
  • no me sale las llaves en esta parte #25566

Closed

  • .NET MAUI SplashScreen PNG Resizing Incorrectly to Circular Shape #25500
  • [iOS] CollectionView will not scroll to the end of a horizontal list when ItemSpacing > 0 #14788
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [ci] Improve CI agents and pools #25491
    .NET 9 SR1
  • NRE when setting images on buttons with a null ImageSource on iOS in 8.0.92 #25409
    .NET 8 SR10
  • MSTEST project referring to a MAUI project sometimes fails to build #7806

  • Embedded web view for blazor hybrid #25557
    Triaged
  • HapticFeedback for iOS crashes on iOS 17.4 since SR2 #25560
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Unable to add different resolution images for platform specific in .net MAUI while migration #23822

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Bump Aspnet 8.0.10 #25586
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump ASPNet Versions #25587
  • Fix NRE on Clearing Tasks #25588
  • Fix missing SeedData #25582
  • Fix toast #25580
  • Template fixes #25577
  • [Windows] Improve AOT compatibility on Windows #25476
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [ci] Specify windows image #25568
    testing-infrastructure, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [ci] Update versions sdk/runtime #25535

  • iOS UIImpactFeedbackGenerator should be used on iOS 17.5 and up #25561

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix toggle for including sample content in template #25564
  • Fix toggle for including sample content in template #25549

Updated

  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [Android] RefreshView in a grid #25413
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Model annotation changes absent from Down() method of initial migration #35016
  • Rollback migration command for efcore #35015
  • GroupBy with joined table produces sub optimal query #35014
  • Compile generated UnsafeAccessors classes don't match underlying class accessibility level #35013
    9.0.0
  • How may I resolve? #35012
  • Compile generated EntityType classes are susceptible to variable name clashes #35011
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite keeps handle on file even after close, and pool clear #35010
  • Should I use foreign keys for a composite primary key? #35008
  • EF Core fails to translate LINQ query to SQL if JOIN contains multiple columns #35007
  • AOT : when precompile model is not nativeaot compatibile, we should throw informative exception telling users to use -nativeaot switch #35006
    10.0.0

Closed

  • New Provider: Appropriate mechanism for injecting query hints #35009
  • Analyser issue with FindAsync #34966
  • System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.String' to type 'System.Int32'. #34959
  • Format of the initialization string does not conform to specification starting at index #34946
  • Make DbContext release references to entities when they are removed or detached. #34987
  • FromSql(): Allow SqlCommand-like type as an overloaded method parameter #34990
  • Discrepancy with Temporal tables results #34972

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/9.0 TEST ONLY] adjusting some migration tests so that baselines dont depend on the product version #34977
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have a type/type mapping #34995

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [internal/8.0.1xx] Installer CI builds failing to find System.Diagnostics.EventLog with version (>= 8.0.1) #20142
  • Can't install .NET6 runtime on Ubuntu 22.04 #19845
  • How to integrate dotnet/installer into SDK and download the latest unpublished preview version, such as SDK release 9.0.100-preview6.xxxx for macOS's pkg file? #19837
  • Potential off-by-one in versions for runtime packs/app hosts/etc for .NET 7 vs .NET 6? #19067
  • .NET 8.0 aarch64 not available on Fedora 39 nor Ubuntu 22.04 LTS #17922
  • Investigate reports of .NET SDKs not working after install on macOS #18154
  • Add verbose option to build.sh (to apply to all parts of the dotnet-sdk src (ie fsharp,runtime,etc)) #18054
    backlog
  • Upgrade the SDK after creating and running projects, the SDK was installed SxS not upgraded. #17907
  • Nuget.config with multiple sources causes installation failures #17904
  • dotnet 7.0 and dotnet 8.0 are incompatible (host part) #17894
